Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.spi

Interface HalApiAnnotationSupport

  • @ConsumerType
public interface HalApiAnnotationSupport
    An SPI interface that allows the core framework to support additional annotations in your HAL-API interfaces. Using this extension point is only required if you are using interfaces with legacy annotations.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isHalApiInterface

        boolean isHalApiInterface​(Class<?> type)
        Parameters:
        type - the type to check
        Returns:
        true if this type is annotated to be a HAL APi interface

      • getContentType

        String getContentType​(Class<?> halApiInterface)
        Parameters:
        halApiInterface - annotated interface
        Returns:
        the content type of the resource represented by the interface

      • isResourceLinkMethod

        boolean isResourceLinkMethod​(Method method)
        Parameters:
        method - from a HAL API interface
        Returns:
        true if the method returns a link to the resource

      • isResourceRepresentationMethod

        boolean isResourceRepresentationMethod​(Method method)
        Parameters:
        method - from a HAL API interface
        Returns:
        true if the method returns the resource representation

      • isRelatedResourceMethod

        boolean isRelatedResourceMethod​(Method method)
        Parameters:
        method - from a HAL API interface
        Returns:
        true if the method returns a linked or embedded resource, or a collection thereof

      • isResourceStateMethod

        boolean isResourceStateMethod​(Method method)
        Parameters:
        method - from a HAL API interface
        Returns:
        true if the method returns the resource state

      • isResourcePropertyMethod

        default boolean isResourcePropertyMethod​(Method method)
        Parameters:
        method - from a HAL API interface
        Returns:
        true if the method returns one of the resource properties

      • getPropertyName

        default String getPropertyName​(Method method)
        Parameters:
        method - for which isResourcePropertyMethod(Method) returns true
        Returns:
        the name of the property (from the value attribute of the annotation)

      • getRelation

        String getRelation​(Method method)
        Parameters:
        method - for which isResourceLinkMethod(Method) returns true
        Returns:
        the relation to be used for links and embedded resources returned by the method
